ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
des: "Enjoy this as an entree or a side salad on a warm summer evening. Try it with garlic breadsticks."
ins:
In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook pasta until al dente, rinse under cold water and drain.
In a large bowl, combine the tortellini, spinach, cheese, tomatoes and olives. Add enough salad dressing to coat. Toss and season with salt and pepper.
